name: Jeepney Simulator 2
description:
OVERVIEW


Embrace your inner jeepney driver once again in the big, bustling streets of Manella City! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this one-of-a-kind driving game. Bring your friends, customize your jeepneys, and face rising quotas. Will you survive? or fade into history?

CAREER MODE


Do you think you have what it takes to be a pro jeepney driver? Test your skills in Jeepney Simulator 2's CAREER MODE! Race against the clock as you hone your driving skills, memorize routes, and upgrade your jeepney to keep up with the ever-increasing boundary. Remember: Every peso counts!

FREERIDE MODE


FREERIDE MODE is a way for players to experience Jeepney Simulator 2 in a stress-free way. Customize the game to your heart's content and do away with the challenge of the boundary. It's very useful for learning the basics and memorizing the streets of Manella City. Prepare to kick back and relax with your favorite playlist!

FEATURING THE BIG, BUSTLING MANELLA CITY


Immerse yourself in a city based on the real thing! With familiar landmarks as Tondoo, Rizz El Park, and BBC, you'll feel right at home. And with the addition of a few unique landmarks, we guarantee there's lots of adventure to be had!

REALISTIC DRIVING AND IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY


- REALISTIC GRAPHICS
- Rotating steering wheel and moving gear shift, with INVERSE KINEMATICS
- HEAR THE JEEPNEY ROAR with immersive audio
- Simple, yet REALISTIC DRIVING! Watch your RPM meter and change gears at the right time!

REALISTIC TRAFFIC SYSTEM


Navigate the busy streets and weave through traffic!

=== PLANNED FEATURES ===


ONLINE COOP MODE
FULL VEHICLE CUSTOMIZATION
POLICE CHASES
CONTROLLER AND STEERING WHEEL SUPPORT
MORE EVENTS

See you on the road, drivers!
